title: Heel Team 6 plays half of you for fools and you just sit there and let her.
body:
Then you realize that it's too late after you've fallen for a person who intentionally goes after naive males to feed her lustful ego. 

Please, think before you act. Don't be stupid. Don't do the thing you'll regret with someone like her.

She doesn't care about you, and she'll never care about you. you're literally nothing but a sick game to her.

Akali
BFNA
Norscout
Top PIz

To name a few.

Did you guys really think you were the only one?
